item.title: [COLOR red][B]******* Cần Addon Plexus & Addon Sportsdevil *******[/B][/COLOR]
[COLOR cyan][B]THỂ THAO QUỐC TẾ TỔNG HỢP Có Bóng đá các giải ngoại hạng:Anh, Tây Ban Nha, Đức, Italya....(Auto Update hàng ngày) [/B][/COLOR]

item.item:
////////////////////////////////////////
[B][COLOR blue]>>> XEM THỂ THAO QUỐC TẾ TỔNG HỢP (Theo Giờ VN + 5 Tiếng)[/COLOR][/B] $doregex[makelist]
makelist
<item><title>[COLOR lightgreen][makelist.param1] [/COLOR] [COLOR deepskyblue][makelist.param2] [/COLOR] [COLOR lightslategray][makelist.param3] [/COLOR] [COLOR skyblue][makelist.param4] [/COLOR] + [COLOR lightyellow][makelist.param6] [/COLOR] [COLOR lightyellow][makelist.param8] [/COLOR] [COLOR lightyellow][makelist.param10] [/COLOR] [COLOR lightyellow][makelist.param12] [/COLOR] </title> <link>plugin://program.plexus/?url=[makelist.param5][makelist.param7][makelist.param9][makelist.param11]&mode=1&name=Arenavision</link> </item>
center'>(.*?)<[\w\W\s]{0,2}>(.*?)<[\w\W\s]{0,60}alt='(.*?)'[\w\W\s]{0,55}br>(.*?)<|[\w\W\s]{0,40}acestream://(.*?)"[\w\W\s]{0,120}flags/(.*?)png|[\w\W\s]{0,30}acestream://(.*?)"[\w\W\s]{0,120}flags/(.*?)png|[\w\W\s]{0,30}acestream://(.*?)[\w\W\s]{0,120}flags/(.*?)png|[\w\W\s]{0,30}acestream://(.*?)"[\w\W\s]{0,120}flags/(.*?)png https://avezy.tk/ Mozilla https://s29.postimg.org/txckqm8ev/sports.jpg
///////////////////////////////////////
[COLOR cyan][B]>>> KÊNH THỂ THAO VIỆT NAM[/B][/COLOR] http:// https://s29.postimg.org/txckqm8ev/sports.jpg
BÓNG ÐÁ 1 (By talktv.vn) $doregex[m3u8]
m3u8 iosUrl.+?"(.*?m3u8)" http://talktv.vn/baovipboydzz
https://s30.postimg.org/yyex12te9/bongda.jpg
//////////////////
BÓNG ÐÁ 2 (By talktv.vn) $doregex[m3u8]
m3u8 iosUrl.+?"(.*?m3u8)" http://talktv.vn/playonline
https://s30.postimg.org/yyex12te9/bongda.jpg
//////////////////

[COLOR cyan][B]>>> KÊNH THỂ THAO (Ace stream) 2[/B][/COLOR] $doregex[makelist]
makelist
<title>[COLOR deepskyblue][makelist.param1][/COLOR]</title> <link>plugin://program.plexus/?url=[makelist.param2]&mode=1&name=Adryanlist+Arenavision</link> <thumbnail>https://s22.postimg.org/9vk2rbqep/ace.png</thumbnail>
EXTINF:-1,(.*?)\nacestream://(.*) http://super-pomoyka.us.to/trash/ttv-list/ttv.sport.player.m3u Kodi/15.2 (Windows NT 6.1) App_Bitness/32 Version/15.2-Git:20151019-02e7013
https://s22.postimg.org/9vk2rbqep/ace.png

[COLOR yellow][B]>>> Thể Thao Tổng Hợp (In YoutuBe)[/B] [/COLOR] $doregex[makelist]
makelist
<item> <title>[makelist.param1] ( [makelist.param2] )</title> <link>$doregex[makelist2]</link> <thumbnail>https://s29.postimg.org/ojsoj485j/sports.jpg</thumbnail>
span class="" >(.*?)<\/span>\n.*?\n\n.*?\n.*?;list=(.*?)" https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEgdi0XIXXZ-qJOFPf4JSKw
makelist2
<item> <title>[makelist2.param2]</title> <link>plugin://plugin.video.youtube/play/?video_id=[makelist2.param1]</link> <thumbnail>https://s29.postimg.org/ojsoj485j/sports.jpg</thumbnail>
dir="ltr" href="\/watch\?v=(.*?)".*?\n(.*?)\n https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=[makelist.param2]
https://s29.postimg.org/ojsoj485j/sports.jpg
/////////////////////////////
